3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent volume and perspective; cutaway is clean and professional.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Significant layout divergence. The 3D model adds rooms/partitions not present in the 2D plan and misses the specific laundry/bath/WC sequence.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is present and scaled appropriately, though placement follows the altered room layout rather than the original plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Very high rendering quality; light and materials are clear with no text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The 3D model partitions the space differently than the 2D plan (e.g., extra rooms in the front-left and different bathroom layout).
The garage/external structure from the plan is entirely missing from the 3D render.

summary: A high-quality 3D render that fails on strict geometric fidelity by altering room configurations and omitting the garage.
